landing.bio: I am a DevOps Engineer and also React Native Engineer. My tech stack includes JavaScript, Go, Python. Go and Python for server side and scripting and i use Javascript to build cross mobile platform application (React Native). I have also worked with Ruby and Java. I am an MSP (Microsoft Student Partner), a GitHub Campus Expert at my institute where i am responsible for building campus community. I am also the lead Ambassador for Ingressive, and the lead organizer for HackerEarth and the co-founder of AnorakS in University of Ibadan

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of CowryWise.
Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of Microsoft.
Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of Youth For Tech.
Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of GitHub.
Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of CodeLN.
Responsible for training new ambassadors, distributing swags and sharing basic information.
Designed and implemented MVP for SMS keycode system Using Twilio REST API and Python Language

education.university: University of Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from writing codes or script, i enjoy watching movies and listening to music
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the development world.

awards.awardDetail: Internet Network Society (Network Services and Monitoring) 2018
